text: Geoffrey "Geoff" Pierson (born June 16, 1949) is an American actor. He is known for his role on The WB series Unhappily Ever After as Jack Malloy. He is also known for his roles on Ryan's Hope and Dexter and as James Baker in the 2016 television movie Killing Reagan. In 2005 and 2006 he appeared in two episodes of Veronica Mars as Stewart Manning, the father of Meg Manning.
